BayesianLearningCode

BayesianLearningCode provides R code to reproduce (most of the) examples in a future book.

Typical use case

Click on Articles on top of the page to view the R code.

Installation

If for some reason you’d like to have the entire package on your computer, you can do so by installing the development version of BayesianLearningCode from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("gregorkastner/BayesianLearningCode")

Note that this is typically only needed for advanced use cases.
